name: description
Tin: In allomancy, tin is considered to be an internal, physical, pulling metal. Burning tin heightens the senses of smell, sight, and touch. Additionally, the enhanced eyesight allows for mists piercing, improving sight at night. The pairing for tin is pewter.

name: book source
Tin: The Final Empire, Chapter 7; The Final Empire, Ars Arcanum; The Final Empire, Allomancy Alphabetical Reference
